DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate effect Diaphragm Release Manual Technique diaphragm mobility , chest wall kinematics functional capacity COPD patient . Methods : Randomized control trial ( double blind ) COPD patient , allocate two group : intervention ( IG ) receive Diaphragm Release manual technique 6 non-consecutive session control group ( CG ) , receive sham protocol ( light touch ) parameter IG . Outcomes evaluated : immediate post treatment effect ( 1 6 session respectively ) . The primary outcome analyse diaphragm displacement ( ultrasonography evaluation ) secondary outcome comprise abdominal chest wall kinematics .
DOC.brief_title: Diaphragm Release Manual Technique Efficacy COPD Patients
DOC.criteria: CPOD patient exsmokers clinically stable patient ( exacerbation previous 6 week ) force expiratory volume one second ( FEV1 ) < 80 % predict FEV1/FVC â‰¤ 0.7 , post bronchodilator cardiopulmonary disease BMI > 30.0 kg/m2 History thoracic surgery Denial participate
